title: Fox News Analyst Viciously Slams Sarah Palin

comments.text:
Actually, I like the way she wears her hair and I really don't care where 
she is from. What in the hell does that have to do with the liberal media?﻿
comments.author: Shannon Reynolds

comments.text:
In hindsight, it's interesting that most people were more afraid of the 
possibility of McCain dying and Palin becoming the president. Whereas, in 
and of itself, McCain's presidency would have been disaster enough; as he 
has non-stop been pushing for escalation of every war and conflict all over 
the world (Iraq, Syria, Libya, Sudan, Iran, Ukraine...) by advocating 
American involvement and arming factions (he even met with and advised the 
ISIS leader a couple of years ago in Syria/Lebanon). It would've been good 
news for the global weapons industry though! ﻿
comments.author: dar rak

comments.text: I don't vote, but if Sarah Palin runs, I will vote for her EVERYTIME!﻿
comments.author: atube4view

comments.text: Boobies!
comments.author: atube4view

comments.text: then you're an idiot.
comments.author: Brian Lynch

comments.text:
I'm getting scared on how much I'm becoming interested in politics, it's 
like black hole it's terrible no one understands it and we'll I can't 
resist it :(﻿
comments.author: TheFault InOurTardises

comments.text:
Cenk ruins a good thing with some sexist commentary at the end.  He calls 
Liz Trotter "bitter" and implies she's being catty and jealous about 
Sanford's affair: "You've been stung, haven't you". 

Yes, that's right, Cenk.  Liz is lashing out at Palin because she's bitter 
about some past love affair that's turned her off men, or whatever.

That's not a comment you'd level at a man who made 
similar comments.   Thumbs down, Cenk.﻿
comments.author: CyeOutsider

comments.text: EXACTLY. Pissed me off too!
comments.author: Tallison Rausch

comments.text:
This is kind of weird even Fox News slams her, calls her inarticulate and 
ignorante. 
Palin wanted to be a member of "The View" they wouldn't have her. So she 
started her own TV channel (not sure I am right here) and you have to pay 
9.95 a month to listen to her spout all her bullshit.﻿

comments.text:
As bad as Sarah Palin is, it's republicans as a WHOLE that end up exposing 
themselves as ignorant retards. The fact that they SUPPORT this incredibly 
stupid woman is a reflection on THEM, not her.
If they had ANY sense, they would have disowned her after her first fifteen 
minutes of fame, instead they continue giving this parasite a FORUM to 
continue spreading her garbage.
Last but not least, McCain has escaped completely without a scratch. He is 
single handedly responsible for making this bitch relevant in the first 
place. She should have been banished back into obscurity with her hick 
family. McCain should have also been forced into retirement. He is an 
embarrassment, and has squeezed every ounce of sympathy from his status as 
a war hero. ENOUGH with that douchebag as well.﻿
comments.author: dcaseng

comments.text:
Boy did this interview backfire. They had all the pro Palin commentary 
strolling by in her defense while that lady just pick her apart.﻿

comments.text:
Liz Trotta is my new hero.
 She is what he Republicans were when I was growing up. I don't care about 
the remark she made at the end, she was making a joke and it must be quite 
insulting for her to watch dingbat from hell Sarah Palin open and shut her 
big mouth. Palin has been the one who has talked about her family and such 
and if I remember correctly, when news came out about Bristol, it was Obama 
who came out and said that families were "off limits." Did she ever say 
thank you, of course not. Palin has no credibility.﻿

Vice President of any country.

comments.text:

along...I think I hear your mother calling you.

comments.text:
